name: XWUIActivityFilter
description: Filter and search activity stream by type, user, date range. Provides filtering controls for activity messages with search, type filters, date range selection, and preset filter tabs.

input.description: Input data required for the component
rules: Optional filterPresets array for preset filter configurations
Each filter preset must have label and filter object

messages.description: Array of activity messages to filter

filterPresets.description: Optional array of preset filter configurations

rules: Renders filtered activity thread based on current filter state
Emits change events with filter object and filtered messages array
Updates thread component when filters change

filteredMessages.description: Array of messages matching current filter criteria

actions.description: User actions supported by the component
rules: Search input filters messages by content
Type dropdown filters by activity type
Date range picker filters by timestamp range
Preset tabs apply predefined filter configurations
onChange event fires when filter state changes

onChange.description: Register callback for filter change events

showSearch.description: Show search input for filtering messages by content

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the component
